name: banana-sales-management
description: A comprehensive banana sales management application with real-time tracking and analytics

scripts.start: node -e "const path = require('path'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const appPath = path.join(__dirname, 'app.html'); console.log('Opening app.html...'); execSync('start ' + appPath, {shell: true});"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install

author: Banana Sales Team
